Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look at how they play their instrumentsâ€”
<sp:5:0:0>they're having so much fun!

Seeing them happy makes me happy too.<sp:0:4:0>They travel from place to place just to
spread joy to other people... <sp:5:0:0>Maybe
there's something to that.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's really coming down!<sp:5:0:0> Let's talk when
it's less wet.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Traveling from place to place just to put
smiles on people's faces...<sp:0:4:0>That's so cool!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want to hear the troupe perform.<sp:5:0:0>
Could you give me a minute?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>You're the guy who rescued us back
at Gerudo Canyon, right?<sp:5:1:0> You are!

Fancy meeting you here!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>After everything that went down, my
friends were all adventured out, and we
decided to go our separate ways.
I was wondering what to do next when
I stumbled onto this troupe...<sp:5:0:0>and my
life was forever changed!
The way they play their instruments is
incredible! Imagine traveling from place to
place just to perform for people.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We're a bit far from the troupe over here,
but it's kind of neat to hear their
performance through the rain.
